title: Completed all Missions for Worlds, but
body: I haven't received my 175 bonus for completing all the missions (including the worlds pass). Have they handed them out already?

replies.body:
So those 175 tokens weren't exactly "bonus" tokens you get at the end, but rather the sum of tokens you would get from the base missions.

https://i.gyazo.com/339e795c41387ccdd73d322b9da2cfc3.png

The "Completing ALL of the Missions will get you 175 Tokens for free" was misleading. I thought doing all the base missions + master pass would get you 175 tokens for free. But "free" here meant doing the base missions.
I ain't even mad about it, that confused the heck outta me too at first tbh!
